1.caption_en:
A colorful tree-style infographic titled "VENTURE GOVERNANCE v5.0" showing governance elements (Mission, Vision, Values, Objectives, Founders, Partners, Corporate) as circular icon nodes on branching stems. A dark footer bar contains the main title, logos and a QR code.

2.caption_en:
A clean, stylized "tree" infographic with seven colored branches representing organizational concepts (Mission, Vision, Values, Objectives, Founders, Partners, Corporate), each shown as a circular icon with a white pictogram and a short uppercase label. Curved colored ribbons form the trunk and connect each labeled circle to the base, emphasizing growth and relationships.
